name: newsreact
description: News CMS with Astro + React + Express

scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,public,admin -c blue,green,yellow "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:public" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../public && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install
scripts.build: cd public && npm run build && cd ../admin && npm run build
